summary.overview: This JCL performs account data management operations by refreshing the VSAM indexed dataset for the CARDDEMO application. It removes existing account data, creates a new indexed file structure, and loads fresh account records from a sequential file.
business_functions: Delete existing account data storage to prepare for fresh data setup
Create new indexed account data storage structure with 11-character account key and 300-character record size
Load account records from sequential file into indexed VSAM structure for efficient account access

ACCTFILE.jcl.program_overview: IBM Access Method Services utility for VSAM file management operations

datasource_summary.name: Account Data VSAM File (AWS.M2.CARDDEMO.ACCTDATA.VSAM.KSDS)
datasource_summary.function: Primary storage for account data records with 11-byte key and 300-byte fixed record size, used for efficient keyed access to customer account information

datasource_summary.name: Account Data VSAM Data Component (AWS.M2.CARDDEMO.ACCTDATA.VSAM.KSDS.DATA)
datasource_summary.function: Data component of the account VSAM cluster that stores the actual account record data

datasource_summary.name: Account Data VSAM Index Component (AWS.M2.CARDDEMO.ACCTDATA.VSAM.KSDS.INDEX)
datasource_summary.function: Index component of the account VSAM cluster that maintains key sequence for efficient data retrieval

datasource_summary.name: Account Data Sequential File (AWS.M2.CARDDEMO.ACCTDATA.PS)
datasource_summary.function: Sequential source file containing account data records to be loaded into the VSAM account data file
